Potential 1.title: Habitual Delay
Potential 1.description: Combo skill Distortion improved: Physical Susceptibility duration +3s.

Potential 2.title: Lowered Expectations
Potential 2.description: Ultimate Tremolo improved: Ultimate Energy cost -10%.

Potential 3.title: Delayed Work
Potential 3.description: Battle skill Onomatopoeia improved: Freezing sound wave range +50% and DMG Dealt +40% to the first enemy hit.

Potential 5.title: Survival is a Win
Potential 5.description: After applying Solidification to an enemy, Estella gains 5 Ultimate Energy. Effect can only trigger once every 1s.
